chargeHist.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Daniel Gerald Ferguson

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial conference on September 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

11:06 a.m.  Court calls all cases (STC/Prelim/ARGN) and cites appearances.  Def appears in person, in custody.  Atty Carly Sebion appears via Zoom.  Matthew J. Tingstad appears for the State of WI.  Atty Sebion indicates def will be waiving Def waives prelims in Cases 21CF74 and 22CF07.  Court questions def. re waiver of rights.  Def states he understands.  He discussed w/his atty.  No questions to ask or threats made to him.  Court finds def knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waiving prelims in 21CF74 and 22CF07.  Court reads counts.  Def understands charges.  Waivers accepted by Court.  DA:  Info counts will mirror complaint.  22CF20.  Atty Sebion waives reading of info/complaint.  Def pleads NG on all both counts.  In 21CF74, Atty Sebion waives reading of info/complaint.  Def pleads NG on all counts.  In 22CF7, def pleads NG per Atty Sebion.   Parties need to sit down and discuss.  9/15 at 1:30 p.m.  PTC set.  Covers all cases.  Atty Sebion brings up bond.  Need same for him to attend funeral as long as last week.  Sat funeral.  Leave Thurs noon and Monday back.  Court agrees to modify bond.  $20,000 cash bond/sig bond to take effect at 9:00 Thurs morn. prov. only go to funeral location and be back by Monday at noon.  Adj.  11:17 a.m. Clerked by wmg/typed by klr
Preliminary hearing on August 31, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Return on warrant on August 4, 2022 at 09:30 am.

1:46 p.m.  Court calls case, cites appearances.  Atty Sebion appears via Zoom.  Def fails to appear.  Court reviews files.  Atty Sebion indicates she has not had contact with def in a few weeks.  DA requests BW.  Court authorizes bench warrant.  SW/MI.  Body only.  Adj.  1:47 p.m.  klr
Plea hearing on April 21, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
Pre-trial conference on March 24, 2022 at 10:30 am.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: 8:49 Court calls all cases.  Initial appearance on 22CF7 addressed first.  Def acknowledges rct of complaint, waives reading.  Also waives time limits for H.  Atty Sebion requests another PTC.  PTC set for 3/24 at 10:30 a.m.  Adj.  8:51 a.m.  klr

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Initial appearance on March 9, 2022 at 08:45 am.

1:44 p.m.  Court calls case, cites appearances.  Def appears in person, in custody.  Hiedi Brewer appears via Zoom for def.  Complaint has been filed.  Bail to be set today.  Def waives reading of crim complaint.  DA refers to other cases def has.  Requests bond mirror previous bonds.  DA is not requesting forfeiture at this time and no new conditions.   Def indicates he does not have any money.  Def indicates has address on Copper Street and is employed.  Atty Brewer argues that def has local ties, this is not a violent action, no money, employed, etc.  Requests cash be combined with last bond or signature bond.  Court sets $1,000 signature bond.  Additional condition no driving while revoked.  Initial to be set for 3/9 at 8:45 a.m.  Adj.  1:54 p.m.  klr
Defendant shall not drive while revoked.
